column5: This sunny bedroom in my Vintage Cottage Home has off street parking and it's own private entrance through a picket fence gate. My home is in the Historic District near The Square with easy access to all Highways.   McKinney is one of the best places to live & have fun according to a bunch of sources. It's a Marvelous place to Shop, Dine & Enjoy & is Unique by Nature. The house has been painted a bright peach with a multi-color picket fence. It'll be easy to find!
